page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content:
{Thornton Watlass Primary School}is a Church of England Voluntary Controlled school.It is fairly new.It was opened in 1969.It is surrounded by grass.There is a playing field and a play ground.It is a two teacher school.There is an Infant class and a Junior class.There is a part time Infant teacher who takes the youngest of the Infants for three mornings each week.
The children start school in the term in which they have their fifth birthday.They leave when they are eleven years old. Then they go to Bedale School.
Many children have a long way to travel so they need transport. Most use cars, some taxis, and others the school bus. A few walk.
